com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.block

Interface IBlockSampler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBlockUpdater, ISampler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBlockMCMCSampler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockMHSampler

    public interface IBlockSampler
extends ISampler, IBlockUpdater
    Sampler that updates a block of variables instead of updating one variable at a time. Implements the IBlockUpdater interface, allowing it to be used to create a BlockScheduleEntry.
    Since:
    0.06
